channel.title: Logging in
channel.description: Hi everyone, starting to play minecraft for the first time and I'm having a little trouble login in. I'm connected to our server, I have an updated client but when you connect and its time to login with your forums username I don't get the code you use. like for example would mine be "/login Andrew_Ferguson Password" ? Would love some help because I love single player mode. (: Thanks in advance -Andrew

item.title: Logging in
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

CoonHunter:

I thought you didn’t enter your username? So like if my pass was ‘cookies1234’, I would just type ‘/login cookies1234’. Have you set your minecraft name in your profile as well?

Ah ok thank you, I didn’t realize, I thought you had to do the username and password. Thank you again. (:

Read full topic
